metadata.name: Maya & Miguel
metadata.summary: The adventures of 10-year-old siblings Maya and Miguel Santos.
metadata.description: MAYA & MIGUEL chronicles the adventures, and sometimes misadventures, of 10-year-old siblings Maya and Miguel Santos, and features their family, relatives and a richly diverse neighborhood of friends.
metadata.keywords: PBS, PBS KIDS, kids, children, children's programming, cartoons, educational, reading
